metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3448 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
REST client for Ruby (aka rest-client) before 1.7.3 logs usernames and passwords, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information by reading the log.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3448` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-rest-client - 1.8.0-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-rest-client package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.0-2ubuntu1').
